subject: Re: [junit] Classloader Cannot Find Resource
msgSnippet: On 24 Sep 2003 19:00:13 -0500, Eric Everman  ... Correct me if I am wrong (and I am sure someone will :) but can t you use the
messageBody:
On 24 Sep 2003 19:00:13 -0500, "Eric Everman" <everman@...>
said:
> Hi- I'm using Junit (3.7?) with Eclipse.
>
> In my text case, I attempt to load an image as a resource. The thing
> is, the class loader cannot find the resource. Here is the line,
> resulting in url == null:
>
> URL url =
> this.getClass().getResource("/com/preceda/webnews/test/world_map-906.png");
>
> This works fine in other code within the same project, but bombs inside
> a test case. I know there is a special class loader used by JUnit to
> allow tests to be rerun - is that class loader not able to load
> resources?

Correct me if I am wrong (and I am sure someone will :) but can't you use
the System's classloader?

--
=jason
[:question | ^One]
